docs.title: BHI-Research Group
docs.text: BHI-Research is a multidisciplinary research group located at Bahía Blanca city, Argentina. Research topics involve High Performance Computing, Computer Vision, and Machine Learning.

docs.title: Accelerated Optimization
docs.text: • PSO-JAX: An accelerated Particle Swarm Optimization tool that uses JAX key component

docs.title: Content Extraction from Video
docs.text:
• Flash Video Summarization: A faster than real-time video summarization algorithm. Source
  • Open Summarization Toolbox (Python implementation). Source
  • Open Summarization Toolbox (C++ implementation). Source

docs.title: High Performance Computing and Education
docs.text:
• Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) as an Educational Tool for Parallel Processing. See Demo and Source.
  • Parallel Processing Teaching Toolkit. Source
